Introduction
This topic contains information on limitations on fiduciary contact, including
IRS limits on VA
fiduciary worksheets prior to fiscal year 2015
verifying FTI in
court-appointed guardian cases
, and
Federal fiduciary cases
VA fiduciary underreported income
, and
notifying Federal fiduciaries of award changes
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
